check.name: Author/OriginatorPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Author / Originator concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept Author/Originator is present."
if(Author/Originator is not None and len(Author/Originator) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "Author/Originator concept is not present"
return False
